description: Adds VS Code tasks + extension recommendation for bd.

title: Add Better Auth Email OTP plugin
description:
Implement Better Auth Email OTP plugin per https://www.better-auth.com/docs/plugins/email-otp.

Scope:
- Server: add emailOTP plugin + sendVerificationOTP handler
- Client: add email OTP client plugin
- UI flows: sign-in with OTP; (optional) email verification via OTP; password reset via OTP
- Non-blocking email send on Workers (use waitUntil)

Acceptance:
- Can request sign-in OTP and sign in via OTP locally
- sendVerificationOTP implemented (at least dev logger), no runtime errors

title: Spike: Email OTP plugin flows
description:
Review Better Auth Email OTP docs and decide which flows we ship first: sign-in, email verification override, forget-password.

Capture decisions:
- OTP length/expiry
- disableSignUp / sendVerificationOnSignUp settings
- storeOTP strategy (plain/hashed/encrypted)

Reference: https://www.better-auth.com/docs/plugins/email-otp

title: Server: wire emailOTP plugin
description:
Add emailOTP plugin to Better Auth config in packages/data-ops/src/auth/setup.ts.

Per docs:
- import emailOTP from better-auth/plugins
- provide sendVerificationOTP({email, otp, type}) handler
- consider overrideDefaultEmailVerification (if we choose it)

Acceptance:
- Server exposes Email OTP endpoints without throwing
- sendVerificationOTP invoked for sign-in + verify + reset

title: Infra: implement OTP email delivery
description:
Implement sendVerificationOTP delivery for Cloudflare Workers.

Constraints from Better Auth docs:
- Prefer NOT awaiting send to reduce timing attacks
- Use waitUntil (Workers) to ensure delivery

Acceptance:
- In dev: at minimum logs OTP (safe local-only)
- In prod: uses a real provider (TBD)

title: Client: add email OTP client plugin
description:
Update apps/user-application/src/lib/auth-client.ts to include the Email OTP client plugin.

Docs show:
- emailOTPClient plugin
- authClient.emailOtp.sendVerificationOtp / checkVerificationOtp / verifyEmail / resetPassword

Acceptance:
- Client exposes email OTP methods and can call sendVerificationOtp

title: UI: sign-in with Email OTP
description:
Add UI flow to request OTP (email + type=sign-in) and sign in with signIn.emailOtp({ email, otp }).

Acceptance:
- User can sign in locally via OTP flow

title: UI: verify email via OTP (optional)
description: If we enable overrideDefaultEmailVerification, add UI to request OTP type=email-verification and call emailOtp.verifyEmail({ email, otp }).

title: UI: reset password via OTP
description:
Add UI flow for forget-password via OTP:
- forgetPassword.emailOtp({ email })
- (optional) checkVerificationOtp
- emailOtp.resetPassword({ email, otp, password })
